Posts.Content: May 22, 2019 01:41PM KimMosley wrote: I am 2 years out from 7 wks of radiation. My breast still hurts & I have red irritation spots. Some days, in 1 small area, it looks like my pores are huge. I have been telling my radiation oncologist as well as my medical oncologist and they have seen it. My radiation oncologist put me on antibiotics for 2 months thinking that maybe there was an infection. There is no infection. The antibiotics did nothing at all. Now it's a touch where the redness is doesn't hurt to touch it it hurts on the inside. My radiation oncologist insist that it has absolutely nothing to do with radiation because I am too far out from it. And I continue to tell her that's a bunch of crap. I've never in my life had issues like this ever. I know it's the radiation.
Posts.Title: After radiation grandmaadams KimMosley
